articles.description: Huawei is rolling out a new EMUI 11-based update with performance and stability improvements for Huawei Mate 40 and Huawei Mate 40 Pro.
articles.content: The Huawei Mate 40 and Mate 40 Pro reached the market last year’s debuting the Kirin 9000 series chipset. This is the last Kirin chipset developed by Huawei HiSilicon. After all, the US ban ceased TS… [+2299 chars]
